FCPA Compliance and Ethics Report-Episode 175-Debra Bruce on new methods for law firm funding and its implications more+ Contact 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=a7196006-f486-4edf-a85e-5cde81570e2d" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"></iframe> In this episode I visit with Debra Bruce, Principle at Lawyer-Coach. She discusses the recent IPO of the English law firm Gately and alternative funding vehicles available to UK law firms. She explains how these new models will change not only law firm efficiency but the practice of law going forward. For those of you in private practice, you need to listen to what Debra has to say as the future may well be here, as in now. Embed Video Send Report Contact Latest Posts
